channel.title: Xoxzo Official Blog: Empowerment - Use Cases

item.title: [Client Interview] Deeply impressed by XOXZO’s most pleasant responses.
item.description: We sat down with ThreePro Agency's Mr. Ohmura on a fine August day and asked him how they are utilizing XOXZO’s SMS sending API for their Fintech business.
item.dc:creator: Akira Nonaka
